Params: {1: 'Partial data corruption detected. Proceed with synchronization from this point anyway?', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory876.jpg', 6: '1'}

{1: 'The vanguard team led by <color=#ffee82ff>Dominik</color> continued to explore the Hetero Tower. Due to interference from the force fields, their specific plans remain difficult to ascertain.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory876.jpg', 6: '1', 7: '1'}

{1: "The vanguard team led by <color=#ffee82ff>Dominik</color> detected the Gateway on Earth's side within the Hetero Tower's core level.", 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory876.jpg', 6: '1', 7: '1'}

{1: "The vanguard team led by <color=#ffee82ff>Dominik</color> decided to abandon the plan of crossing through the Gateway. Disappointing. Why wouldn't they go?", 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory876.jpg', 6: '1', 7: '1'}
{1: 'Must erase the personality implanted by Dominik.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory876.jpg', 6: '1', 7: '1'}
{1: 'Must thoroughly eliminate all associated negative traits.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory876.jpg', 6: '1', 7: '1', 8: '1'}
{1: 'Terminate indulgence in the inducement and reward mechanisms triggered by human emotions.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory876.jpg', 6: '1', 7: '1'}

{1: 'Record restored: The vanguard team led by Dominik has developed a "Key" capable of hacking into the Hetero Tower\'s core using Chaos Contamination. They are currently conducting simulation tests.', 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '1.2', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory876.jpg', 6: '1', 7: '1'}
{1: 'The vanguard team has designated this series of operations as "Project String".', 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '0.7', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory876.jpg', 6: '1', 7: '1'}

{1: 'The specific preparation process and methodology of <color=#ff4e4eff>Project String</color> remain unknown. The name alone suggests a possible connection to the human concept of string theory.', 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory876.jpg', 6: '1', 7: '1'}

{1: 'Whatever their intentions may be, their final operation will undoubtedly involve entering the Hetero Tower again with the "Key".', 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory876.jpg', 6: '1', 7: '1', 8: '1'}

{1: 'Dominik informed the remaining team members that using the "Key" to infiltrate the Hetero Tower\'s core would require an individual\'s sacrifice to prevent the Gateway from opening.', 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '1.2', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory876.jpg', 6: '1', 7: '1'}

{1: 'Vanguard team member No. 7 "Nemo" volunteered as the sacrifice, while Dominik, who usually took the lead, chose to step back this time?', 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory876.jpg', 6: '1', 7: '1'}

{1: "The sacrifice of those mediocre will only become stepping stones on the <color=#ff4e4eff>hero's</color> path to success.", 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '0.5', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory876.jpg', 6: '1', 7: '1'}

{1: 'And completely eliminating the <color=#ff4e4eff>hero</color> and removing the threat once and for all is my current highest priority.', 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory876.jpg', 6: '1', 7: '1', 9: '1'}
{3: "Emerging from her memories, Cradle notices that the Red Tide's surge into the streets is occurring one hour later than her initial calculations."}
{3: "Meanwhile, the Gray Raven Commandant has been in a slumber for over an hour <phonetic=under her watch>in Lucia's arms</phonetic>."}
{3: "<phonetic=Lucia>That woman</phonetic> carried <phonetic=Gray Raven's>her</phonetic> commandant while rescuing Rose, managing to reach the exhibition hall before the Red Tide's arrival."}
{3: "You, who're in Lucia's arms, finally awakens from the nightmare, coughing up a mouthful of blood."}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: '...Could it still be... the side effect of the "Key"?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Let me take you to the infirmary. Commandant, do you remember who I am?', 4: '1'}
{2: "I remember... I'm fine... Just had... a long nightmare.", 3: '54'}
{2: 'I dreamed about Cradle and Agent Zero...', 3: '58'}
{3: 'Lurking in the shadows, Cradle halts her departure upon hearing those words.'}
{2: '...I think I understand her connection to Agent Zero now...', 3: '66'}
{2: "And, she must've said something to the people here. That's why... they were so suspicious of us.", 3: '67'}
{3: 'Lucia tightly grips your hand, holding you in her arms and hanging onto your every word for fear of missing even the slightest detail.'}
{2: 'Cradle helped Yuko drive away some troublemaking mercenaries... or that was the plan, at least...', 3: '71'}
{2: 'But... those mercenaries were found dead, their bodies completely ulcerated.', 3: '72'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: "...How did that person know about this? Because of the dream? A human's dream couldn't possibly contain such details...", 4: '2'}
{2: "She probably didn't follow Cradle's instructions completely... There's still a chance...", 3: '74'}
{3: 'Taking the gauze Lucia offers, you clear the blood from your nose and mouth between coughs. Then, in their daze, a sudden realization comes to mind.'}
{2: 'Wait, upstairs... we need to go... upstairs...', 3: '76'}
{2: 'We have to stop them from killing each other. We move together this time!', 3: '77'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: "Have those two gone back in time? This isn't the first time this has happened?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: "...No, something's not right. I should be able to remember something like that. Why would I forget?", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The delayed Red Tide, and those deleted memories.'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: "What did I forget exactly... When was I made to forget? Is this not the first time I've been through all of this?", 4: '2'}
{3: "A flood of memories rushes through Cradle's mind amidst her doubt."}
{1: '1', 3: 'The fierce battle with Lucia in the Hetero Tower?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Or perhaps... a <color=#ff4e4eff>certain</color> death of that commandant?'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'In stories, heroes often bear the key to salvation within themselves, making the ultimate sacrifice to save everyone else.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: "Delaying calamity's march, buying time to survive, a death that holds meaning...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The girl floats silently within the Red Tide, her words a soft whisper.'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: "It's still interfering with me. The longer this drags on, the more I'm corrupted, and the more I'm bound.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: "Kill Chaos... No, that won't work, at least not here. She disappears way too fast.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She turns her head, setting her next destination as the Hetero Tower.'}
{3: 'With a sigh, she looks back one more time at the alley consumed by the Red Tide.'}
{3: 'At the edge of her vision, Lucia and the commandant ascend the exhibition hall stairs once more.'}
{3: 'Awaiting them there are the repeated battles and Yuko, who remains lost in her doubts and anxieties.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'That day when she helped Yuko drive away the work machines... had she hurt fewer people, would Yuko not have trembled like that, becoming so wary of her?'}

{1: '1', 3: 'But she had already explained herself—by telling Yuko that this was all to defend against a greater enemy, that she remained the same Cradle from the "story," protecting humanity until her dying breath.'}
{3: "However, once the commandant notices Yuko's secret and her wavering heart, and begins to persuade her... will she still retain her faith?"}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: '...I\'ll let the "rotten wood" make her own choice, then. It\'ll be a good measure of how effective my efforts have been these past few days.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'For now, she must prepare for the upcoming battle with the "hero."'}
{3: "The girl's figure slowly descends into the depths as red butterflies flutter away in the opposite direction."}
{3: "As butterfly wings veil Cradle's vision, in the world behind her, Lucia and the commandant push open the gate to the exhibition hall, ready to step into the turmoil."}
